entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow or rain mixed with drizzle beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain mixed with drizzle ending near noon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
